BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: feat: Support custom knex param supports in NC_DB Knex properties can be added with query params, if it's nested it can be dot(`.`) separated. For example `ssl: {rejectUnauthorized:false}` can be added by specifying `ssl.rejectUnauthorized=false`. Sample url `pg://localhost:5432?u=postgres&p=xgene&d=abcde&ssl.rejectUnauthorized=false` re #425 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: Reduce primary string key size ref - https://stackoverflow.com/a/61976932 Signed-off-by: Pranav C <pranavxc@gmail.com> #447
